name: Ninjask
description: NINJASK moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this POKéMON was long believed to be invisible.

abilities.name: Speed Boost
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Speed rises one stage after each turn.

abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves ignore light screen, reflect, and safeguard.
abilities.description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.
